name: Advanced Retirement Planner
description: Professional-grade retirement planning with major partner planning overhaul and multi-step wizard interface
author: Yali Pollak (יהלי פולק)
features: 👫 MAJOR: Complete partner planning system with per-partner data collection
🧙‍♂️ Enhanced 8-step guided wizard for comprehensive couple financial planning
💰 Multi-source income tracking: salary, bonuses, RSUs, freelance, rental, dividends
🌍 Country-specific pension rules: Israel (17.5% + training fund thresholds), USA (12% 401k), UK (8% auto-enroll)
🏦 Per-partner savings breakdown: pension, training fund, portfolio, real estate, crypto
⚙️ Individual management fees and expected returns for each partner
📊 Enhanced 5-factor retirement readiness scoring system
🧮 FIXED: Monthly Income NaN display with proper calculation flow
📈 FIXED: Savings Rate 0.0% calculation with comprehensive income sources
🎯 Training fund threshold logic for Israeli market (₪45k salary threshold)
🧪 Enhanced test suite: 116 tests with 95.7% pass rate
Complete multi-currency integration (ILS, USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, ETH)
Real-time currency conversion and value updates
Responsive design with mobile optimization
5-scenario stress testing system
Claude AI scenario translator
Real-time stock price API integration
Advanced export functionality (PNG, PDF, JSON)
RSU stock price integration for 60+ companies
Multi-language support (Hebrew/English)
majorChanges: 🚀 REVOLUTIONARY UPDATE: Complete partner planning system overhaul
👫 NEW: Per-partner data collection for comprehensive couple financial planning
🧮 NEW: Enhanced calculation engine with multi-partner support and income aggregation
💰 NEW: Sophisticated income tracking (annual bonuses, quarterly RSUs, freelance, rental, dividends)
🌍 NEW: Country-specific pension contribution rules with employee/employer breakdown
🏦 NEW: Training fund threshold logic for Israeli market with blended rate calculations
⚙️ NEW: Individual management fees and expected returns for each partner
📊 NEW: 5-factor retirement readiness scoring (savings rate, adequacy, time horizon, diversification, replacement ratio)
🧪 NEW: Comprehensive test suite with 116 tests across 7 categories (95.7% pass rate)
✅ FIXED: Monthly Income NaN display - Enhanced calculation flow with proper wizard data synchronization
✅ FIXED: Savings Rate 0.0% calculation - Updated to include all income sources (salary + bonuses + RSUs + other)
✅ FIXED: Retirement Readiness Score - Implemented comprehensive 5-factor scoring system
🎯 ENHANCED: Wizard components with detailed per-partner breakdown and validation
📋 ENHANCED: Real-time summary panel with inflation-adjusted projections
🔧 TECHNICAL: Complete partner planning architecture with modular component system
📚 DOCUMENTATION: Comprehensive v6.0.0 documentation update (README, architecture, QA guide)
